ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Attack speedups
ygData.msgSnippet: I think you will find Alacrity even worse.  Our lot as bards, there is nothing we can do that someone else cannot do better.  Of course one would think that
ygData.messageBody:
I think you will find Alacrity even worse. Our lot as bards, there is
nothing we can do that someone else cannot do better. Of course one would
think that better by 38 levels is a bit ridiculous. Unless they played an
enchanter as their primary.

Kit

-----Original Message-----
From: kim@... [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Wednesday, March 29, 2000 10:12 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Attack speedups


From: <kim@...>

Well, this is kinda depressing. I did some timings with my
L18 enchanter and his level 12 Quickness spell while Karana
was down last night:

Time Swings Delay %chg Delay %chg Speed
Normal 177.7 50 35.54 - -
Warsong(50) 285.8 100 28.58 -19.58% 24.35%
Anthem 162.5 50 32.50 -8.55% 9.35%
Celerity 147.8 50 29.56 -16.83% 20.23%
Beserk(50) 148.1 49 30.22 -14.96% 17.59%
Verses 136.9 50 27.38 -22.96% 29.80%

Quick(18) 51.9 19 27.32 -23.14% 30.11%
27.3 10 27.30 -23.19% 30.18%

It would appear the level 12 enchanter spell is as fast as our
level 50 song.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
